name: Rotational Core Exercises
description: Improving core strength through twisting and rotational movements.

cards.title: Russian Twists for Oblique Strength
cards.description: A core rotation exercise targeting the obliques and overall core engagement.
bulletpoints: Keep feet off the ground for added difficulty
Use a weighted ball or dumbbell for resistance
Maintain a controlled motion to avoid excessive twisting

cards.title: Cable Woodchoppers for Rotational Power
cards.description: Strengthening the core through controlled rotational movement.
bulletpoints: Engage the core to drive the movement, not the arms
Use a slow, controlled tempo for better muscle activation
Perform both high-to-low and low-to-high variations
